com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny
Class GenericRange

java.lang.Object
  ej.mwt.Widget
      com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny.GenericRange
All Implemented Interfaces:
ej.microui.Listener, ej.mwt.Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Progress, Scale
public abstract class GenericRange
extends ej.mwt.Widget
implements ej.microui.Listener

A range holds a value between a minimum and a maximum value. The underlying model is a RangeHolder.

Constructor Summary
GenericRange(int boundMin, int boundMax)
          Creates a new range with the specified bounds.
A range is enabled by default.
GenericRange(RangeHolder model)
          Creates a new range with the specified RangeHolder as its model.
A range is enabled by default.

 void setListener(ej.microui.Listener listener)
          Defines which Listener to associate with the widget.
If the defined listener is not null, each scaling action on an enabled scale will call Listener.performAction(int, Object) passing (value, this), where value is the current value of the scale.

setListener

public void setListener(ej.microui.Listener listener)
Defines which Listener to associate with the widget.
If the defined listener is not null, each scaling action on an enabled scale will call Listener.performAction(int, Object) passing (value, this), where value is the current value of the scale.

Parameters:
listener - the listener associated to the button, can be null.
